name: LearnColors
0:
”Alexa, open learn colors”
”Alexa, start learn colors”
”Alexa, play learn colors”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn colors
des: Learn colors creates a differentiator by supporting the beginners and advanced kids in learning colors. Kids may benefit from playing the game again by increase in speed and confidence with colors. It is like a word game to learn and practice colors. Being able to identify real life scenarios, differences and similarities also increases analytical skills.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
